name: An "Easy" Platformer
description:
This is more of a platformer prototype as I am new to game dev
Feel free to give feedback & level ideas

This game also supports controllers if you want to use one(recommended)

Controls

Jump - spacebar, up arrow, A(Xbox Controller),X(PlayStation Controller)

Timer - T, Y(Xbox Controller), Triangle(PlayStation Controller)

Die - R, X(Xbox Controller), Square(PlayStation Controller)

Pause - Escape, Start Button(Xbox Controller & PlayStation Controller )
